description: The image captures three individuals on a grassy hilltop, enveloped in a thick, misty fog. Two men and one woman are seen, with one man pointing into the fog, possibly trying to discern the obscured landscape. The visibility is extremely low due to the fog, adding a mysterious and serene atmosphere to the scene. The individuals are dressed in casual outdoor attire, suggesting they might be on a hike or exploring the natural surroundings despite the foggy conditions.
poem:
In the fog on a hill they stand,
Pointing out with a guiding hand.
Mystery shrouds their every view,
In a world that's damp and dew.
Together they explore, so grand.
